thread.title: Keeper Steve Mandanda denies he is set to ditch Crystal Palace for a return to Marseille
thread.title_full: Keeper Steve Mandanda denies he is set to ditch Crystal Palace for a return to Marseille

author: Neil McLeman
title: Keeper Steve Mandanda denies he is set to ditch Crystal Palace for a return to Marseille
text:
Keeper Steve Mandanda denies he is set to ditch Crystal Palace for a return to Marseille The shot stopper has not appeared for Palace since November due to a knee injury Share Mandanda has denied he is set to return to Marseille (Photo: AFP/Getty Images) Share Get football updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Crystal Palace keeper Steve Mandanda has taken to Facebook to deny he is in talks to return to Marseille . 
The France star moved from the Mediterranean coast to South London at the start of the season but has not played since suffering a knee injury in November. 
Marseille were taken over by new owner Frank McCourt last year and the ambitious American wants to turn the club into a European force. Dimitri Payet and Patrice Evra joined in January – and more signings are promised this summer. Mandanda in action for Palace (Photo: Reuters) Mandanda hasn't played since November (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) Read More Crystal Palace keeper Steve Mandanda is eyeing a return to Marseille 
But after a report in France claiming he is also in negotiations to return, Mandanda wrote: “As I already said a few weeks ago, despite my attachment to Marseille, there is no contact between the directors and me at the moment. 
“What is important to me today is the present and that is at Crystal Palace. I am focussing on my club and survival in the Premier League. My sole concern are the efforts my team-mates and myself must give in order to reach our goals.” 
Mandanda has not keep his love for the Ligue 1 side a secret. Mandanda has taken to social media to hit out at claims he's set to sign a contract (Photo: Matthias Hangst) Read More 
The shot stopper said last month : "Quite simply: everyone knows the attachment I have for Marseille. 
"It would be a great pleasure to return, because my feeling for the club is enormous. 
"If I have to return to France it will be with Marseille and nobody else." poll loading Will Steve Mandanda leave Crystal Palace in the summer? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
